no-email.label: I do not have an email address

journey.header: My BRP has not been delivered

one.header: Have you received a letter from the Home Office telling you your biometrics residence permit was being delivered to you by a courier?

list.one: your biometric residence permit (BRP) is going to be delivered
list.two: your application to stay in the UK was successful

one.date-question: What is the date on the letter?

two.header: Is your address the same as on the letter from the Home Office about your biometric residence permit?

delivery-details.explanation: If you think the courier may have had a problem delivering items to this address (for example there is no number on the door) then let us know and we will contact the courier.

address.title: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Fusce condimentum lobortis eros vitae vestibulum. Donec in arcu vehicula, dictum lacus et, luctus eros.

three.subheader: Complete this section carefully as these details will help us to find your information.

four.subheader: We need your contact details to reply to your enquiry about why you have not received a BRP.

address.title: Please provide your address so that we contact you by post

five.subheader: Check through the information that you have provided to make sure it is correct. If it is incorrect you can change it here.

footer.title: Send your submission
footer.explanation: By sending us your details you confirm that the information you have provided is true and that you accept our terms and conditions and privacy policy.hared with other government departments.

confirmation.header: Thank you, we have received the information you have provided. We are now looking into this.
confirmation.privacy: We keep your personal data secure according to our privacy policy.
confirmation.email: We have sent you an email containing the information you have provided to

para.one: We will now review the information you provided to find out why you have not received the biometric residence permit.
para.two: We will get back to you within 5 working days. For example, if you contact us on a Monday you will hear back by the following Monday.
para.three: We will then advise you what to do next.
